com.skplanet.config

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skplanet.config.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable

    public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable
    Simple Classpath based Configuration Class

    working flow.
    1. Get Configuration instance
    2. Load Properties
    3. Read Properties for given fields

    # You may write properties file using ConfigWriter class

    Created by Donghun Shin
    Contact: donghun.shin@sk.com, sindongboy@gmail.com
    Date: 5/19/13
